Production-grade AI and automation

We build intelligent systems that run your operations and turn data into decisions.

Production-grade AI and automation

We build intelligent systems that run your operations and turn data into decisions.

RRK Technologies scopes, ships, and maintains automation and data products. Multi-cloud by design: GCP, AWS, and Azure. In parallel, we build StockLight - a clean, actionable market insights product.

Explore automation services Open StockLight

Two tracks. One standard.

RRK is a productized automation agency. StockLight is a focused product. Same quality bar.

RRK Automation

covered.textContent:
LLM agents and orchestration across your stack
          UI and API automation with page-object disc
covered.fileContext:
What we do

One company with two focused tracks.

RRK - Productized automation agency

We deliver automation that replaces hours of manual work and makes outcomes measurable.

  • LLM agents and orchestration across your stack
  • UI and API automation with page-object discipline
  • Cloud-native backends and event pipelines
  • Analytics and BI on Supabase and pgvector
  • Quality gates and health checks for stable releases
See services

covered.textContent:
UI and API automation
          Resilient selectors, retries, page-object model, and deterministic f
covered.fileContext:
RRK Services

Enterprise automation that ships

From quick wins to platform work. Scope, build, measure, improve.

UI and API automation

Resilient selectors, retries, page-object model, and deterministic flows. Designed for maintainability at scale.

LLM and agent integration

Clarify, choose, and execute with guardrails. Evaluation and human in the loop where it matters.

Cloud backends - multi cloud

covered.textContent:
1Ingest - RSS, APIs, scrapers, uploads, webhooks
          2Normalize - schema mapping, dedup, enric
covered.fileContext:
Data pipelines - from ingestion to agents

We built StockLight on this discipline. The same approach powers client systems: collect the right data, add structure, score with AI, and expose it through clean interfaces.

Reference pipeline

  • 1
    Ingest - RSS, APIs, scrapers, uploads, webhooks
  • 2
    Normalize - schema mapping, dedup, enrichment
  • 3
    Store - Supabase tables, pgvector embeddings, partitions
  • 4
    Analyze - AI signals, topic modeling, entity linking
  • 5
    Agents - decision units that select tools and produce outputs
  • 6
    Deliver - APIs, dashboards, alerts, exports

StockLight style snippet

Data pipelines - from ingestion to agents

We built StockLight on this discipline. The same approach powers client systems: collect the right data, add structure, score with AI, and expose it through clean interfaces.

Reference pipeline

  • 1
    Ingest - RSS, APIs, scrapers, uploads, webhooks
  • 2
    Normalize - schema mapping, dedup, enrichment
  • 3
    Store - Supabase tables, pgvector embeddings, partitions
  • 4
    Analyze - AI signals, topic modeling, entity linking
  • 5
    Agents - decision units that select tools and produce outputs
  • 6
    Deliver - APIs, dashboards, alerts, exports

StockLight style snippet

symbols -> events -> features -> narrative

alerts -> watchlists -> personalization

covered.textContent:
Web and UI
          
            Page-object model with clear targets
            Retries and resil
covered.fileContext:
Testing - across layers, by design

We test where bugs actually happen: web, API, mobile, and data checks. Visual status for leadership and developers.

Web and UI

  • Page-object model with clear targets
  • Retries and resilient selectors
  • Visual and accessibility checks on key flows

API and contracts

covered.fileContext:
Case study

In-house automation - Matics

Program focused on building an internal automation capability: framework, execution layer, and delivery standards teams can extend.

Scope

  • Unified framework with page-object targets
  • Stable execution and environment controls
  • Reporting approach based on existing tools
  • Playbooks and training for internal teams
Visit Matics Work with RRK

covered.textContent:
Web research engine
        Load data via links, analyze, and synthesize. Useful for due-diligence,
covered.fileContext:
Tools and IP

Selected assets we can adapt to your use case.

Web research engine

Load data via links, analyze, and synthesize. Useful for due-diligence, market tracking, and ops research.

Ingest -> Normalize -> Segment -> Summarize -> Store (Supabase and pgvector)

Voice to prompt for Cursor and copilots

Speak intent and route to the right coding assistant. Reduces ambiguity and saves time.

Audio -> ASR -> Prompt template -> IDE or agent API
